This dress is incredibly flattering. It hugs all the right places and feels amazing.

True to size. Wore this for Thanksgiving and it was perfect. Quality was great, flows at the bottom, stretchy around the zipper for a perfect fit which makes it very comfortable.

I bought this dress before buying the real deal. Considering this dress is like, 1/6 the price of the brand name, it’s decent. The print is darker & the print details are different. Overall, the dupe is darker than the brand name (which I don’t mind). The fit is pretty good, similar sizing to the real deal, however the fit is not as glove-like. Still, it looks very nice on & you can throw this dress in the wash instead of dry cleaning, which is really nice! The fabric is decent - obviously it isn’t silk so the quality isn’t the same, but the fabric is not too cheap-feeling or costumey.

This dress is so flattering.  It is very thin material so if that bothers you, you won't like it.  I don't find it to be see through though. True to size. very breathable. Its just so flowy and easy. Great summer dress, or even for fall with a cardigan.  Wrinkles fall out pretty easily.  I took a star away because the material is quite thin so not sure how long it will hold up..
This was a birthday gift for my daughter and she loves it. She says it's so cute and comfortable
This dress was beautiful but sadly the sizing is completely off. The chest area was way to tight and I had to return. The fabric was not the best quality either.

I love this dress, so beautiful! Perfect for the fall.

LOVE!! the fabric is so soft, i feel so comfortable in it!! the size is great, fits my body very well. the straps are adjustable so its like a built in bra just without the actual bra hehe. overall quality is great!! very impressed :)

I am 5’10” and usually wear XL or 14/16. I love that this dress has a stretchy panel in the back and the adjustable tie and the front bust. The fabric is the perfect weight for summer and these hot So Cal Septembers/Octobers. The cut of the top is very flattering and the midi-length hits just right on me (I’m 5’6” with average length legs). I liked it so much I bought a second one. Would definitely recommend
Fit well. I'm 5'10", 150 Lbs and the Medium was perfect.

Not lined. But very light fit well and very cute. I’m usually a med/large and got a large. So glad because it has no stretch. It has small upper zipper on the side for easier access.
Great idea, but failed in execution. The zipper is so long that when you sit down it pouches out. And usually I'm an xs in dresses. This was too small.

So cute, fits well. Love the adjustable straps. The short style is not lined, but the longer styles are. Straps are adjustable and front tie is as well. Side zipper and ruching in the back helps with fit as well. Though the fabric is thin it is not see through. Light weight perfect for summer or to later in the winter. Quality is good for the price. I’m 5’4, 34DD chest, 151lbs and chose size medium. I bought three styles.

评论概述: Size up... WAY up... if you have any shape at all
评论详情: I usually wear a small/extra small in dresses cut like this, but this Small was more like an XXX Small.  Either it was labeled wrong or it's just made for a body with no shape.  Disappointed, as the color and pattern was so lovely. Returning.
This dress is a perfect transition piece from summer to fall. Love it! For reference,  I ordered a small - I'm 135lbs and 5'3".
The fit was weird in the boobs for me, but flattering through the hips. Not for me.

I own a couple of pieces from the actual brand this dress/print is from, but I'll be honest and say I'm not totally impressed with the brand quality which is why I decided to go with the dupe for this item.  Couple of things to note: - sizing between colors is NOT consistent. I have this dress in the green and brown long versions- both size S, however the green is noticeably tighter and fits my chest a bit better in comparison. - Back is shirred but in an unflattering way. You can tell the back pattern just doesn't flow as seamlessly, and the silhouette doesn't translate the same. - prints are decent.  Generally, I think these are really decent dupes and I'm happy I saved the money in this instance. They're really versatile and can be dressed up or down, used day or night, and across multiple occasions. :)
Fit is great, it’s slightly fitted and pretty
True to size, comfortable, good material and so cute for fall!

This dress was so pretty! Very 90’s and I love it. I bought it right after having a baby and it was tight. My mistake. I returned this for this reason but I will repurchase when I’m ready to wear it. Buy it!
Seems it was made specifically for me?!? Fits so well I’m shocked. Please purchase you won’t regret it.
Really nice flexibility in the back of the dress so it has a little support in the bust if you have a smaller chest! Nice figure hug but also comfy. A little short but not unmanageable!

Bought two of these dresses a year ago and really like them. Bought two more a week ago (one in a new pattern, and one as replacement for an old one I stained). It's clear that Omoone changed the fabric used for these dresses because the ones from last year are in a thicker, silkier fabric than the new ones. In comparison the new ones feel low quality. They literally weigh less than the old ones (in a bad way). I also think because the fabric is a lot thinner now, the dresses drape differently and are less flattering. Disappointing because I really liked these dresses. Before, I'd confidently give them a 5 star review. Now I don't think they're worth the $40. Please bring back the old fabric if possible!!

I bought this dress plus the black one. They’re cute dresses, but definitely not worth $40 a piece!!!!!!! The material is thin and not of high quality. I’d pay $25 tops for a dress like this. Not worth spending $80 on them. I’m returning both.
You must buy this dress! It fits so perfect, I am 5ft , 145 and a DD. They large was a perfect fit. The material is comfortable and flowy but still form fitting !
Runs small,
Love this dress! It’s so cute and comfortable. You can adjust the straps differently so you don’t need to worry about wearing a bra.

I usually wear a size large in dresses, I am a bit larger chested. However this dress ran extremely large in chest area. I would recommend sizing down and only purchasing if you are bustier or there will be way too much fabric. Quality of dress is not worth price in my opinion. I returned as dress did not fit whatsoever and didn’t feel the price was worth the quality.

评论概述: Perfect for a casual but elegant sundress
评论详情: I am a dress size 14/16 and bra size 38 DDD and I got size XL in two colors, both of which fit beautifully. For what I wanted, I felt like it supported my chest well without a bra. The adjustable drawstrings at the neckline and the adjustable straps both helped with this. For my fellow curvy midsize ladies, I think it does a great job of accenting my figure without highlighting my tummy. The only downside is the straps do dig into my shoulders, but for such a cute dress some sacrifices have to be made! Definitely recommend this dress :)

I am usually built like a fridge and don’t have hip curves! But this dress really pulled some hips out of the ether. I’m a 38DDD and my boobs dip a bit lower than the breast seam, but I would still feel confident wearing without a bra!! The dress feels like it would be flimsy but she provides some good support and hugs in all the right places. No transparency, color is gorgeous (though a bit more fall toned than I originally thought), and it does the Aphrodite body so well. Definitely get it!

The title says it all: Girl, bye. I bought this dress, for $40!! And yet it’s cheap, thin, and feels like a costume. It’s worth $15, maybe $17 for the sake of the cut, if you’re pushing it. The material is thinner than a pillowcase, (with 0 layers to make up for it), and the design looks printed on. It hangs off me like a nightgown (I’m 5’5” and 120 lbs) and doesn’t touch my curves. I don’t think the smallest size wasn’t available, so maybe I got the size wrong, so I won’t hold it against them, but be aware of this if you take the risk and purchase. But I’d say, look elsewhere!  I will definitely try to return this. Super bummed!
Super cute shape. Just as picture.

评论概述: Great design, not so great fabric. sticky and hot fabric
评论详情: The design is flattering on your body, although I wish there was a slit in the skirt since it is quite narrow and limits your mobility. The fabric is not great; it feels hot to the touch and traps heat inside. I was so hot wearing this. :(
This dress is so flattering and cute . Such a vibe. The fabric is not super thick which is great for the summer .

I got the polka dot print and I love it. It is definitely a thinner material and I can see why people are complaining it feels cheap, but I think as long as you don’t buy a size that’s tight on you it should be fine. I did buy on sale for $29 and I’m not sure I’d be happy paying more than that.  I’m about 5 ft 2 and this hem is at ankle height, so if you are taller this may very well be more of a midi length on you. I found this runs true to size.

I am so tired of rolling the dice with Amazon purchases. This dress is pretty but the material is that cheap viscose and as soon as I put it on it clung to me. I am 5’8” 135 lbs and typically a solid 6. 34D to 36 C The medium is a bit loose in the top. I have other dresses with this cut so going to keep it and hopefully washing it with fabric softener will reduce the cling- may need taken in on top as well

I have this dress in the white with strawberries, and the red. The red one is softer fabric wise. Both true to size, I am typically a 4 or (sm/m), I ordered these in the small. Perfect fits. I get endless compliments when I wear them. Both dresses are super flattering and comfortable.
Great quality and fit!

I love this dress. Its simple, easy to throw on and the print and cut are flattering. I always get compliments on the dress and its just a super easy outfit to throw on for any occasion.
I love this dress! It's so soft and beautiful! The pattern is lovely and very feminine! It fits just right and received compliments the 1st time I wore it!

Received this item ripped used and smelling absolutely disgusting. Amazon has no quality control.
Has a zipper 👏🏻 Got this in three patterns; blue green, tan floral and black with roses. The black runs a little bit smaller than normal size.

I typically stray from non-stretchy materials for fear of how they cling to my stomach area, but this is surprisingly forgiving! (I have a decent amount of loose skin and carry weight in my lower tum area) I’m usually between a Medium and a Large for most things and I went with Large for this because the straps are adjustable.  The only reason I knocked off a star for this is because I don’t feel like the quality of the material & zipper match the price. It’s nice enough to keep, but I likely won’t repurchase another pattern/color due to that.  My measurements: Underbust: 32” Bust: 37” Waist: 30” Hips: 42”
Cute dress, had I sized up it would have not fit right.  The material is thin, and subject to stay I cling… even in humidity so that’s a hard pass.  Likely perfect for someone with a boxy frame
I love everything about this dress! It can be dressed up or down . It fits amazingly. I just feel really pretty in this dress. I’m going to order more colors. Seems to be true to size

Love this dress. Super easy to dress up or down! Quality is good and I like the adjustable straps. It’s a good summer dress and very comfortable for hot summer days! I was skeptical and had this in my cart for a while, but I am so happy that I bought it because as soon as I put it on, I realized that it’s so cute and so in style and it fits me in all the right places!!! Love love love. Highly recommend.

i ordered a medium and I’m 5’10 and 140 lbs. i was wanting a tighter fit around the waist but i was worried that the length would be too short. the length on the medium is perfect for me, looks just like the pictures. it still has a flowy, slouchy shape that is flattering but i think im going to take it in around the waist.
LOVE the pattern! Fabric isn’t the greatest quality, but excellent for the price! I followed the size chart and it fits nicely. Excited to have a comfy dress for the summer!
